Package org.yacineall.api.newsapi.builder

Class RequestBuilder.EverythingRequestBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.yacineall.api.newsapi.builder.RequestBuilder
org.yacineall.api.newsapi.builder.RequestBuilder.EverythingRequestBuilder
Enclosing class:
RequestBuilder
public static class RequestBuilder.EverythingRequestBuilder extends RequestBuilder
Builder for creating requests to the Everything endpoint of the News API.
